mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mht_portal.oa_notify( id, type, title, content, files, status, office_id, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{files}, #{status}, #{office.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mht_portal.oa_notify SET TYPE = #{type}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, FILES = #{files}, STATUS = #{status}, office_id = #{office.id}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy.id}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}, REMARKS = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
